summary: File detection and syntax highlighting for EazyText wiki markup
name: vim_etx
description:
File detection plugin for `etx` file extension, which are contains EazyText markup. Syntax highlighting for EazyText wiki markup.

To know more about EazyText wiki processor vising http://eazytext.pluggdapps.com
install_details: Download the tar.gz file into your $(HOME)/.vim/ directory. Change to $(HOME)/.vim directory and un-tar the package.
